alt.description:
Used in combination with `src` or `srcSet` to
provide an alt attribute for the rendered `img` element.

children.description:
Used to render icon or text elements inside the Avatar if `src` is not set.
This can be an element, or just a string.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

component.description:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a DOM element or a component.

imgProps.description:
Attributes applied to the `img` element if the component is used to display an image.
It can be used to listen for the loading error event.

srcSet.description:
The `srcSet` attribute for the `img` element.
Use this attribute for responsive image display.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.colorDefault: Styles applied to the root element if not `src` or `srcSet`.
descriptions.circle: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="circle"`.
descriptions.rounded: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="rounded"`.
descriptions.square: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="square"`.
descriptions.img: Styles applied to the img element if either `src` or `srcSet` is defined.
descriptions.fallback: Styles applied to the fallback icon
